
h1. User-Defined Action Types



1\. Login by user 'root'.

2. Go to *ECM Administration* on the navigation bar.

3. Select *Advanced Configuration* -> *Create an Action Type*.


!form1.jpg!


4. A form will appear:


!action.jpg!


5. Click the *Add* button to create the new action type.


!action2.jpg!


6. Select the type of the action: exo:scriptAction.

7. Input a name for the action. The name must be started with "*exo:*"

8. Check/uncheck the *Action Move* option: the action will has exo:move property or not.

9. Select an execute for the *Execute* field.

10. Variables: allows to create multi-values for the action. If you want to add more values for the action, click the
!icon3.jpg !
 icon. Click the
! icon2.jpg!
 icon to delete a value.

11\. Click the *Save* button to accept adding a new action type.
